title: Leveled up - didn't get a reward?
body: Is there any chance I may get my level 33 reward simply by asking?

replies.body:
Hey there, I checked this out for you and confirmed that a capsule was obtained.  It contained quite a good amount of goodies!

Champion (Shard): 1 Evelynn
Champion (Shard): 1 Mordekaiser
Champion (Shard): 1 Ryze
270 Blue Essence

Let me know if that clears things up!
